sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; export default function GameSetup({ onSetupComplete }) { const [numPlayers, setNumPlayers] = useState(3); // Default: 1 human + 2 bots return (

Game of 17

Select the total number of players (including yourself):

{numPlayers} Players

Game Rules:

- Each player starts with one card

- Take turns drawing cards

- Must draw until you reach at least 11

- First to reach exactly 17 wins

- Going over 17 eliminates you

); }
